description: Connection to InfluxDB with metrics from signalk and telegraf required

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "outside")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minimum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maximum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "clouds" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 100.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "clouds")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uvindex" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "uvindex")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed" or r["_field"] == "direction")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "true")
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 
	      if r._field == "speed" 
        then ((r._value * 1.943844))
	      else ((r._value / 3.1415 * 180.0) - 90.0) 
	  }))
	|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["direction"] and exists r["speed"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, column: "direction", createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "inside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "inside")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "fridge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "fridge")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "freezer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "freezer")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "water")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "water")

from(bucket:"${signalk}")
  |> range(start:  -6h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Pressure")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tanks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:  (r._value * 100.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["label"] and exists r["type"])
  |> group(columns: ["type", "label"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${skhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${fhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${hosts})/ and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: [
        "usage_user", 
        "usage_system"
    ]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
        usage_user: "user",
        usage_system: "system"
    })

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signalk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "bucket")
  |> last()
list.name: signalk

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["id"])
  |> distinct(column: "id")
list.label: MMSI
list.name: mmsi

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement != "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")
list.label: Sources
list.name: sources

  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")

title: SignalK Board [landing]
